A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The best Star Wars since the original trilogy. The characters introduced in The Force Awakens were tasteless and the only reason they were what they were was P.C. reasons. Rian Johnson saved them. The Last Jedi gives them weaknesses\, temper and spirit. I could spoil 3 scenes that prove that Rian Johnson clearly understood what made us love Star Wars when we were kids\, but of course I won't.
I'm disappointed to see that J.J. Abrams will direct Episode 9\, but I'm so happy to know that Johnson will direct an entire trilogy. Since Episode 2\, I had never imagined that I would see a good Star Wars again in my entire life.

Thank you Rian Johnson. Thank you.
